original: Ekberg, Nils Gustav Henry, bataljonsveterinär, Linköping, f. 21/6/09 i N. Sandby, Krist. 1., av Nils Gustav E. o. Lallie Ekberg. G. 38 m. Hjördis Enert. Barn: Hillevi f. 39, Gustav 42, Marie-Louise 46. — Stud:ex. v. Kristianstads h. a. 1. 29, veterinärex. 3f Krigskir. stud. i Finl. 41-42. Tf. distr :veterinär i Östervåla, Hedemora o. Simrishamn m. fl. platser, bat :ve-terinär v. Norrl. dragonreg. 40, dito v. Svea trängkår i Linköp. sed. 44. Bat:veterinär i Fvk res. 37. FFrK4kI m sv, SvBS förtj:SM.
translated: Ekberg, Nils Gustav Henry, battalion veterinarian, Linköping, b. June 21, 1909 in N. Sandby, Kristianstad County, son of Nils Gustav E. and Lallie Ekberg. Married in 1938 to Hjördis Enert. Children: Hillevi b. 1939, Gustav b. 1942, Marie-Louise b. 1946. He graduated from Kristianstad's high school in 1929 and received his veterinary degree from the Krigskirurgiska Institutet in Finland in 1941-1942. He was acting district veterinarian in Östervåla, Hedemora, Simrishamn, among other places, and battalion veterinarian at Norrland Dragoon Regiment in 1940 and the Svea Trängkår in Linköping from 1944. He was a battalion veterinarian in the Fvk Reserves in 1937. He was awarded the Medal of the Order of the Sword, 4th Class with Swords, and the Swedish Veterinary Association's Merit Medal.
